Package boone.training

Standard training algorithm implementations for Boone.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackpropTrainer
    The plain back-propagation trainer with optional momentum term.
    HebbTrainer
    The Hebbian trainer is of more theoretical importance, as it simply uses the basic Hebb update rule to change the weights and biases of the net.
    HopfieldDeltaTrainer
    Trainer for Hopfield networks using the delta learning rule.
    LVQTrainer
    The Learning Vector Quantization training.
    NetError
    Collection of Neural network error measurements.
    RpropTrainer
    The Resilient Back-propagation trainer.
    SOMTrainer
    The unsupervised SOM training algorithm implementing a simple dot product SOM with a linearly decreasing learn rate and a linearly decreasing neighborhood radius.
    TrainingSignalGenerator
    TrainingSignalGenerator class - calculate some training signal out of a neural network and some.
    TrainingSignalGenerator.SquareError
    Square error function.

Package boone.training Description

Standard training algorithm implementations for Boone.

This package contains a number of basic training algorithms for Boone. There is a BackpropTrainer which implements backpropagation training, optionally with momentum. The RpropTrainer is a backpropagation variant, which usually converges much faster. The HopfieldDeltaTrainer is an iterative training algorithm for generalized Hopfield networks.
